DOC.detailed_description: Between March 2014 March 2016 , 200 child upper gastrointestinal symptom ( 4-18 year ) H. pylori infection recruit Beijing Children Hospital.After inform consent obtain guardian , child randomly classify two group : 10 day standard triple therapy ( Omeprazole 0.8-1.0mg/kg.d , bid , Amoxicillin 30-50mg/kg.d bid， Clarithromycin 15-20mg/kg.d bid ) , 10 day tailor therapy include one Proton Pump Inhibitor ( Rabeprazole 0.4-0.5mg/kg.d , bid . Esomeprazole 0.8-1.0mg/kg.d , bid ) two antibiotic ( Amoxicillin 30-50mg/kg.d bid , Clarithromycin 15-20mg/kg.d bid , Metronidazole15-20mg/kg.d bid ) base antibiotic susceptibility cytochrome P450 isoenzyme 2C19 genotype . Eradication status reassess four week treatment .
